title: Looking for people to join our team for the Oceanic Open Ladder.
body:
Hey we want gold/plat + rank.
This is going to be a serious Ranked team
Please fill this in for a chance to join.

IGN:
Age:
Can you use Voice coms?:
Rank:
Favourite Lane:
Favourite champs:
Are you Mature?:
Why should we pick you?:

**MID AND SUPPORT IS ALREADY TAKEN**

Thank you!

replies.body:
IGN: I Really Irelia

Age: 18

Can you use Voice coms?: Yes

Rank: Diamond V

Favourite Lane: Top > Jungle

Favourite champs: Irelia, Lissandra, Swain, Jarvan, Kha'Zix, Evelynn, Nautiuls

Are you Mature?: Yes

Why should we pick you?: I am always positive and have never been banned or chat restricted in the 5 years I've been playing this game. I know how to avoid ganks and I enjoy roaming as a top laner. I enjoy being on a team and want to win tournaments.

Top:

* Irelia
* Lissandra
* Swain
* Jarvan
* Nasus
* Xin Zhao
* Malphite
* Cho'Gath
* Kha'Zix

Jungle: 

* Nautilus
* Evelynn
* Jarvan
* Warwick
* Nasus
* Fiddlesticks

IGN: fullMETALTurban

Age: 23

Voice coms? : Anytime before 10 yes, after 10 I can only use it on occasion, but am happy to sit in a channel and listen to communications, or can talk but only very quietly.

Rank: Gold V/IV

Favourite Lane: Top

Favourite champs: RIven, Ezreal, Irelia, Twisted Fate, Master Yi.

Are you mature?: When necessary.

Why should we pick you?: I am a dedicated, competitive player that plays to win. I am always seeking to improve myself and am willing to work cooperatively with a team. In the past, I have consistently received compliments on my understanding of the game and ability to make relevant calls.  I have some experience playing competitively, having finished 2nd place in a Lan tournament in 2012. 

Note: I will also need some further information regarding when you guys plan on practising. I am generally available throughout the week but can't usually play until too late, except on occasion.

IGN: it hurts when ip
Age: 18
Can you use Voice coms?: Yeah
Rank: gold iv probs gold iii after today
Favourite Lane: mid/adc
Favourite champs: Kat, zed, ori, lucian, ez, vayne.
Are you Mature?: I'd say so.
Why should we pick you?: I can play a range of team comps and I am a very reliable adc.

IGN: Original Chief
Age: 20
Can you use Voice coms?: I have skype but can download other as well if need be 
Rank: Gold IV
Favourite Lane: ADC
Favourite champs: Lucian/ Corki/ Graves/ Varus
Are you Mature?: I think so 
Why should we pick you?: Very strong ad, high KDA on all champs.

MID AND SUPPORT IS ALREADY TAKEN

Thank you!
